rule.name: Add Comment
rule.description: Give points when registered user add new comment.

rule.name: Update Comment
rule.description: Give points when registered user or admininstator/moderator update comment.

rule.name: Remove Comment
rule.description: Deduct points when registered user or admininstator/moderator remove comment.

rule.name: Vote Comment
rule.description: Assign points when a user votes a comment.

rule.name: Comment has been voted as good
rule.description: Assign points to the author when the comment has got positive vote.

rule.name: Comment has been voted as bad
rule.description: Assign points to the author when the comment has got negative vote.
